spec_data.Name: perl-MooX-Cmd
spec_data.Description:
Works together with MooX::Options for every command on its own, so options
are parsed for the specific context and used for the instantiation:
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:43:20 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Giving an easy Moo style way to make command organized CLI apps
